summary: This test suite validates the collective communication plugins used in Lightning Fabric. It checks that a single-device collective plugin can be instantiated without arguments and correctly creates its communication group, and that the TorchCollective plugin can create, manage, and clean up process groups, supports default and custom groups, and functions properly on both CPU and CUDA devices.
